ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Radiant Wolf Sword
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sword that emits a blade of energy, which is both indestructible and luminous.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fang Sword
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Runic Blade
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Summoned magical sword that lasts for a limited amount of time.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Assassin Sword
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Slow Down and Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Brand
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Chill and Pain on enemies, increasing the Frost and Physical damage they take.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Strange Rusted Sword
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “The Commander said to make this sword fit for a king.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fang Axe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sunfall Axe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
“The Dawn Weaver’s knowledge remade us; we grafted porcelain to our flesh.”
Inflicts Burning on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Beast Golem Axe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tuanosaur Axe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Extreme Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Horror Axe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Extreme Poison on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Brutal Club
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Confusion on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Marble Morningstar
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Confusion on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fang Club
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Merton’s Firepoker
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “A flamin’ weapon that don’t go cold, prefect for a lad that can’t die!”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blacksmith's Vintage Hammer
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “The smith wanted to refine, strengthen and sharpen all weapons in the armory.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Obsidian Mace
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Burning on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Primitive Club
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The lowest of the low when it comes to weaponry, though it can easily be crafted with Wood.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Skycrown Mace
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “The Dusk Father’s knowledge made us all kings; we built our sky castles under the earth.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fang Greatsword
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Zagis' Saw
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Immense man-cutting saw of the bandit lord Zagis.
Inflicts Pain on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Starchild Claymore
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “The Dawn Weaver’s knowledge showed us the way; He came from the stars, and to the stars we shall follow.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Assassin Claymore
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Slow Down and Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pathfinder Claymore
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Vulnerability to all non-physical elements on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Royal Great-Kopesh
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Pain on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Great Runic Blade
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Summoned magical sword that lasts for a limited amount of time.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fang Greataxe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crescent Greataxe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Vulnerability to all non-physical elements on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tuanosaur Greataxe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Extreme Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Worldedge Greataxe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “The Dusk Father’s knowledge is eternal; this world is but one stop in His travel across the great void.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fang Greatclub
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mantis Greatpick
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Pain on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mining Pick
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Essential tool to harvest mineral deposits.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pyrite Greathammer
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Confusion on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pillar Greathammer
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Artifact greathammer of an executioner who guarded the Spire of Light, crushing the bones of invaders before feeding on them.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Manticore Greatmace
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Extreme Poison on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Obsidian Greatmace
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Burning on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fang Trident
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Werlig Spear
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Artifact spear of the Cabal of Winds.
It was forged to slay horrors, who are weak to lightning.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Troglodyte Pole Mace
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Confusion on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Phytosaur Spear
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Poison on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fang Halberd
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mushroom Halberd
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Poison on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Thrice-Wrought Halberd
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Artifact forged long ago by a female blacksmith for a Gold Lich she loved.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crescent Scythe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Vulnerability to all non-physical elements on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Beast Golem Halberd
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dreamer Halberd
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “The Dusk Father’s knowledge is universal; even lesser beings can learn what we have been taught.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mage’s Poking Stick
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “The mage who used this stick favored magic that manipulated fire, shadow and time.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Simple Bow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Beginner's short bow mostly used to hunt small game, due to its lack of power.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Recurve Bow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Compact bow which inflicts Slow Down on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: War Bow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Immense bow which inflicts Confusion on enemies, making them more vulnerable to Impact.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Horror Bow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Bow made from Shell Horror chitin which inflicts Poison on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Coralhorn Bow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Bow which inflicts Pain, cursing the enemy to receive more physical damage, made from Coralhorn Antler.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Round Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Basic shield of wood and iron.
Blocking with a shield is more advantageous than blocking with a weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Zhorn’s Demon Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
An unusual possession of the ancient great hunter.
Whatever magic used to enchant this shield is long gone, though it retains its excellent craftsmanship.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tower Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Immense shield that is quite heavy, but that protects from arrows aimed for the wielder’s head or legs.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Wolf Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Shield used by the Wolf-Knights of the northern reaches, who brave the bitter cold to stop the spread of icy beasts. Inflicts cripple on shield charge

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fang Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The added fangs do little to improve the shield’s toughness, but are telling of the wielder’s mental state. Inflicts bleeding on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Old Legion Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Peculiar oval shield used by the warriors of an ancient legion. Inflicts bleeding on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Plank Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Hastily built from broken planks, it grants the ability to block arrows, at least.
This shield is unlikely to last long in a fight.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Marble Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A shield made long ago to be ornamental, due to its weight, but that is still useful in combat. Inflicts confusion on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Inner Marble Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A shield that has been masterfully made, being meant for guards within a ruler’s inner circle. Inflicts confusion on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold-Lich Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
A shield seldom used by a lich minions, as they have no regard for their life.
Mortal agents can be rewarded with this equipment, however.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dragon Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Shield depicting a fictional creature of great power; one that is common in street theatre and children’s books. Inflicts burning on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crimson Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Blood-red shield used by the leaders of northern tribes.
Its bold color makes it stand out in the snowy landscape.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Steel Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Common but high-quality shield used by warriors of the desert.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mushroom Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Specially grown fungus used by Troglodytes as offerings to their queen-goddess. It makes for a surprisingly usable shield. Inflicts poison on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Horror Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Monstrous shield best used in a deadly combination with a one-handed axe also made of chitin. Inflicts extreme poison on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Palladium Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Depicting a sun, this shield is praised for its high durability.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fabulous Palladium Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “Sometimes, it’s not about power, it’s about style.” Inflicts elemental vulnerability on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ornate Bone Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Morbid shield made by the deranged gravekeeper Cremeuh, to reward you for robbing graves. Inflicts haunted on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tsar Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Shield of the highest quality, beset with a Tsar Stone that gently emits green light.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Coralhorn Mask
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “On the festival’s first day, we celebrate the spirit of honor.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Scarab Mask
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “On the festival’s second day, we bow to the spirit of perseverance.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tuanosaur Mask
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “On the festival’s third day, we cower before the spirit of death.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Hound Mask
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “On the festival’s last day, we shun the spirit of hunger.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Purple Dancer Clothes
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sensual clothes that enable one to dance, or fight, without end.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Black Dancer Clothes
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sensual clothes that enable one to dance, or fight, without end.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crimson Dancer Clothes
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sensual clothes that enable one to dance, or fight, without end.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dancer Mask
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sensual mask that enables one to dance, or fight, without end.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dancer Leggings
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sensual leggings that enable one to dance, or fight, without end.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pearlbird Mask
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Strange mask that makes one want to run fast and caw loudly.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Makeshift Leather Attire
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Like other survival attires, this improvised coat has additional pockets.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cauldron Helm
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “When calling the kettle black just wasn’t enough.”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Merton’s Ribcage
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A bizarre illusory costume of a legendary skeleton adventurer.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Merton’s Skull
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A bizarre illusory costume of a legendary skeleton adventurer.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Merton’s Shinbones
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A bizarre illusory costume of a legendary skeleton adventurer.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gaberries
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Common berry that only offers a small amount of nutrition and will quickly rot unless cooked.
As a fruit, these berries restore stamina over time.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crabeye Seed
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Poisonous seed that, when grilled, is the first step in creating usable poisons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Turmmip
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Bulbous root vegetable with mana-restoring properties.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Raw Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Edible meat that should be cooked first, as it rots quickly and carries diseases while raw.
As a type of meat, this food restores health over time.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Raw Alpha Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Potent meat from prime animals, which rots quickly and carries diseases while raw.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Larva Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Eggs of exotic insects, with diverse restorative capacities.
Eating it raw carries a chance of disease.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Azure Shrimp
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Rare crustacean coveted by fishermen for its mana-restoring qualities but that can make one ill when eaten raw.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Raw Rainbow Trout
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Shimmering fish that restores mana but that can make one ill when eaten raw.
It also increases your resistance to all elemental damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Raw Salmon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Common fish that is edible raw but rots quickly and can make one ill.
Fish and seafood have mana-restoring properties, and are quite important in a mage’s diet.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blood Mushroom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Peculiar toadstool that gives headaches when eaten raw, but is an ingredient in health-restoring elixirs.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Star Mushroom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Celestial toadstool which restores mana and is an ingredient in magic-restoring elixirs.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Marshmelon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Heavy marsh fruit that restore far more stamina than Gaberries.
These raw melons gain anti-poison properties when boiled.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cactus Fruit
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Heavy desert fruit that re-invigorates and protects against the sun.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ochre Spice Beetle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Uncommon reinvigorating insect that lives in plants and is used in advanced recipes.
Eating this insect protects from the cold.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gravel Beetle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Scarab, found in mineral ores, whose resin hardens one’s body from Impacts.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Common Mushroom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Bland mushroom which restores little hunger, often found in dank caves.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bird Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Large Pearlbird egg that carries a chance of disease when eaten raw.
Eggs provide both health and stamina recovery over time.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Woolshroom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Airy mushroom strands that, when eaten, muffle the sound of one’s footsteps.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Miasmapod
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Rare marsh octopus, which closes wounds but poisons the eater.
It also instantly cures infections.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Raw Jewel Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Iridescent flesh of a rare bird which increases one’s movement speed.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Smoke Root
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Fire-infused plant that grows in burnt lands.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Krimp Nut
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Edible nut that is a main ingredient in stamina-restoring elixirs.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Food Waste
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Diseased mush that is what remains when a cooking recipe fails.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cooked Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Slab of meat grilled over a campfire, removing any risk of disease.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cooked Alpha Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Piece of very nutritious and fortifying meat.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Jerky
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Salted meat that rots very slowly.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alpha Jerky
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Salted alpha meat that rots very slowly, while retaining the special meat’s qualities.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alpha Sandwich
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Combined bread and alpha meat, which keep the meat’s combat-enhancing properties.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gaberry Jam
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Crushed berries boiled into nutritious syrup, with warming properties.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Salmon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Fish cooked over a campfire, removing any risk of disease.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Rainbow Trout
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Highly prized fish filet that shimmers brightly.
It restores mana and increases your resistance against elemental damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bread
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Basic food that can be bought in any city, as many recipes use this simple ingredient.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cierzo Ceviche
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Dish of raw Rainbow Trout that keeps the fish’s mana-restoring and elemental resistance attributes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pungent Paste
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Odorous paste which restores your maximum health and stamina, allowing you to continue adventuring without sleep.
It also instantly cures infections.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Meat Stew
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Filling but ordinary dish made with whatever meat and plants are at hand, with a pinch of salt.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ocean Fricassee
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Superior egg and fish dish with healing properties which restore health, stamina and mana.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Luxe Lichette
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Special dish of the Chersonese which restores a fair amount of stamina and a large amount of health.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dry Mushroom Bar
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Mushrooms pounded into a bar shape.
It restores a bit of maximum health.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pot-au-Feu du Pirate
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Salted fish soup is more restorative and nutritious than fish alone.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Turmmip Potage
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Chunky soup that has mana-restoring properties, and will slowly heal the common cold.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Miner’s Omelet
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Filling omelet that is a good way to use Common Mushrooms to cook into a decent dish.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cooked Larva Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Hardened exotic egg that rots more slowly than its raw counterpart.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cooked Bird Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Pearlbird egg boiled over a campfire, removing the risk of disease.
Eggs provide both health and stamina recovery over time.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gaberry Tartine
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Gaberry jam thinly spread on bread, used to multiply the effects of jam into several portions.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boiled Gaberries
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Boiled fruit that provides a bit of nutrition and rots more slowly.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boiled Turmmip
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Boiled root that increased its mana-restoring properties.
It is no longer reinvigorating, however.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Mushroom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Crumbling fungus that barely provides nutrition.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cooked Jewel Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Iridescent steak of a rare bird that increases one’s movement speed.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boiled Miasmapod
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Boiled octopus that is less toxic but with lower restorative qualities.
It also instantly cures infections.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Marshmelon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tender fruit, boiled to reveal its anti-poison properties.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boiled Cactus Fruit
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Mushy fruit that, after being boiled, offers an immediate jolt of stamina.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ragoût du Marais
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Special dish of the Hallowed Marsh that immediately heals wounds, unlike most food.
It also gives the Possessed boon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Stew
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Elaborate stew using alpha meat and a gravel beetle, which gives Impact Resistance as well as adding Impact to one’s attacks with the Rage status.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Marshmelon Jelly
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Translucent spread of delicious fruit jam.
The concentrated melon confers an immense stamina recovery.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Marshmelon Tartine
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Melon jelly thinly spread on bread, making several rations, each with the full stamina-restoring properties of a jar of marshmellon jam.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Seared Root
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Fire-infused plant, seared again in fire.
It will slowly remove the common cold with its heat.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Woolshroom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Crudely cooked mushroom that, when eaten, muffles the sound of one’s footsteps.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Toast
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Burnt slice of bread.
It fills the belly, but does little else.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Diadème de Gibier
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Special dish of Abrassar, allowing one to run fast and without pause.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spiny Meringue
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Thorny dessert with high health and stamina restorative properties.
It also helps against the sun when eaten.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cactus Pie
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Dish of invigorating cactus fruit and bread that helps against the heat when eaten.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bread Of The Wild
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Special dish of Enmerkar that is unequaled in healing wounds over time.
It also grants the Warm boon and an increase in stealth.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fungal Cleanser
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Medicinal mushroom dish that removes poison and diseases.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Stringy Salad
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Mixture of vegetables and mushrooms that heals a bit, but can fill an empty stomach.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boiled Azure Shrimp
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Cooked crustacean coveted for its mana-restoring qualities.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Travel Ration
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Bland biscuit used when traveling from one region to the next, though it can be eaten as normal food as well.
This food has no properties apart from being filling, and can even be made using Survival Crafting.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Roasted Krimp Nut
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Roasted nut that increases the metabolism.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Crabeye Seed
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Seed that becomes more toxic after being cooked and can be crafted, using linen, into a poisonous weapon coating.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bouillon du Predateur
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Soup which restores stamina and increases the physical damage one deals to foes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gaberry Wine
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Alcoholic drink that makes one unstable on their feet, but reduces the mana cost of spells.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Waterskin
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Drinking water restores stamina over time and removes the Burning status.
It can be filled at fountains or in natural bodies of water.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bitter Spicy Tea
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction that instantly cures infections, protects against the cold and restores burnt Stamina.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Soothing Tea
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Concoction that cures the common cold and restores burnt Mana.
It takes hours, after drinking this, to fully recover from the cold.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Needle Tea
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Concoction that helps with the heat and indigestion. It also restores burnt Stamina.
It takes hours, after drinking this, to fully recover from an indigestion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mineral Tea
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Concoction that increases Impact Resistance and cures indigestion. It also restores burnt Health.
It takes hours, after drinking this, to fully recover from an indigestion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Life Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Potion which instantly heals some wounds.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Astral Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Potion which instantly restores some mana.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Endurance Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Potion which instantly reinvigorates a tired body.
It restores a bit of max stamina.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gep's Drink
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Brew that restores a moderate amount of health, stamina and mana.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rage Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction that temporarily increases your weapon’s Impact.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Discipline Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction that temporarily increases your Physical Damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Warm Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction that temporarily increases your Fire Damage and Resistances.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cool Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction that temporarily increases your Frost Damage and Resistances.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mist Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction that temporarily increases your Ethereal Damage and Resistances.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blessed Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction that temporarily increases your Lightning Damage and Resistances.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Antidote
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Brew that neutralizes most poisons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Hallowed Marsh Antidote
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Strange brew that neutralizes the Hallowed Marsh’s poison, but not other toxins.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Possessed Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction that temporarily increases your Decay Damage and Resistances.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Stealth Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Brew that temporary increases your stealth, making enemies less aware of your presence.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Elemental Resistance Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Powerful concoction that temporarily grants moderate resistance against Fire, Frost, Lightning, Decay and Ethereal damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Elemental Immunity Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Legendary brew that temporarily grants immunity to Fire, Frost, Lightning, Decay and Ethereal damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Weather Defense Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Concoction that provides relief from warm and cold temperatures.
Note that it has no effect on Fire and Frost damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Stability Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction that increases your Impact Resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Assassin Elixir
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Powerful concoction that temporarily increases your movement speed, stealth and coats your equipped melee weapon with poison.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Hex Cleaner
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Strange brew that removes most negative effects.
Has no effect on Bleeding, Poison, Disease and Burning.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Stoneflesh Elixir
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Powerful concoction that temporarily increases your Impact Resistance and the Physical Damage your attacks deal and grants the Rage boon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Warrior Elixir
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Powerful concoction that temporarily increases the Physical Damage and Impact your attacks deal and grants the Discipline boon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Survivor Elixir
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Powerful concoction that restores stamina and burnt stamina, and provides protection from hot and freezing environments.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Golem Elixir
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Powerful concoction that temporarily increases your weapon’s Impact and gives you the Possessed and the Discipline boons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Great Life Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Concoction which instantly restores health and max health.
It also closes Bleeding wounds.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Great Astral Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction which instantly restores mana and max mana.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Great Endurance Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Concoction which instantly restores stamina and max stamina.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Peacemaker Elixir
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Potion that grants permanent bonuses to the one who drinks it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bandages
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Band of thick linen cloth used to stop a bleeding wound and recover a bit of health.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Poison Rag
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Soiled cloth that envenoms a weapon when rubbed on it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Poison Varnish
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Thick fluid that envenoms a weapon when applied to it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bolt Rag
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Soiled cloth that confers the Lightning element when rubbed on a melee weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bolt Varnish
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Thick fluid that confers the Lightning element when applied to a melee weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fire Rag
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Soiled cloth that confers the Fire element when rubbed on a melee weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fire Varnish
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Thick fluid that confers the Fire element when applied to a melee weapon.
The weapon will also inflict Burning to enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ice Rag
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Soiled cloth that confers the Frost element when rubbed on a melee weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ice Varnish
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Thick fluid that confers the Frost element when applied to a melee weapon.
The weapon will also inflict Slow Down to enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spiritual Varnish
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Thick fluid that confers the Ethereal element when applied to a melee weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dark Varnish
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Thick fluid that confers the Decay element when applied to a melee weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bullet
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Ammunition for pistols, crafted from iron and oil.
Pistol skills often still require bullets.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Simple Tent
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Well-made tent that helps protect against the weather, compared to a bedroll.
Sleeping in this tent gives a small bonus to stamina use.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Improvised Bedroll
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Primitive bedding made from leather, which offers poor sleep quality.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Camouflaged Tent
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Minimalist tent that conceals the user, reducing the chances of being ambushed.
Sleeping in this tent gives a medium bonus to stamina use.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fur Tent
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Layered tent of thick furs that grant high resistance to the cold weather.
Sleeping in this tent gives a large bonus to stamina use.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Luxury Tent
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Highly visible silk tent that offers high sleep quality, quickly healing the user.
Sleeping in this tent gives a huge bonus to stamina use.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mage Tent
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Quality tent that, when slept in, helps the efficiency of one’s spells.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Plant Tent
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Wondrous shelter born of a seed, which protects against the heat and refills one’s thirst and hunger.
This tent cannot be picked back up.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Campfire Kit
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Deployable fire kit that must then be lit, usually with a flint and steel.
Campfires are used to cook, disinfect water, brew potions and to keep warm.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cooking Pot
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Heavy pot that enables the preparation of recipes with more than one ingredient, to be used on a lit campfire.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alchemy Kit
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tools used to distill ingredients into potions, to be used on a lit campfire.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tripwire Trap
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Device that must be armed with a compatible item, then triggered by an enemy.
After deployment, traps can be disassembled to retake the trigger and the item inside.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pressure Plate Trap
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Device that must be armed with a compatible item, then triggered by an enemy.
A specific passive skill must be learned in order to deploy a pressure plate.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Explorer Lantern
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Oil lantern that shines brightly.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Old Lantern
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Rusty oil lantern with a weak flame.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Glowstone Lantern
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Quasi-eternal lamp that shines with glowstone instead of burning oil.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Firefly Lantern
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Fireflies trapped in the glass, and not oil, makes this lantern glow.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Makeshift Torch
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Torch that shines weakly, held in the off hand.
It burns out quickly, but warms up the wielder.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ice-Flame Torch
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Alchemical torch that cools the wielder even in sweltering temperatures.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Lantern of Souls
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Magical lamp that protects against elemental damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Lexicon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Book used to cast runic spells.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rondel Dagger
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Dagger with a nasty edge.
This off-hand weapon requires Dagger Skills to be used.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Broad Dagger
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Dagger that inflicts Bleeding.
This off-hand weapon requires Dagger Skills to be used.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Red Lady's Dagger
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Ancient artifact of the Scarlet Lady.
This off-hand weapon requires Dagger Skills to be used.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shiv Dagger
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Improvised blade made from scrap.
This off-hand weapon requires Dagger Skills to be used.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Manticore Dagger
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Craftable dagger that inflicts Extreme Poison.
This off-hand weapon requires Dagger Skills to be used.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chakram
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Chakram spells are necessary to use this off-hand weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ornate Chakram
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Chakram spells are necessary to use this off-hand weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Kazite Chakram
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Chakram spells are necessary to use this off-hand weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Frozen Chakram
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Vulnerability to all non-physical elements on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mysterious Chakram
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Chakram spells are necessary to use this off-hand weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Thorn Chakram
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts bleeding on enemies. Chakram spells are necessary to use this off-hand weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flintlock Pistol
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Basic gun that needs the Fire/Reload skill to shoot.
Locking on enemies is vital to hit with pistols.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cannon Pistol
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Heavy gun that needs the Fire/Reload skill to shoot a bullet, inflicting Confusion on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ornate Pistol
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Gilded gun that needs the Fire/Reload skill to shoot a superior bullet.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chimera Pistol
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Powerful gun that inflicts vulnerability to Fire, Frost, Lightning, Decay and Ethereal damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bone Pistol
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Gun that needs the Fire/Reload skill to shoot a ethereal bullet, inflicting Haunted on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Obsidian Pistol
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Gun that needs the Fire/Reload skill to shoot a fiery bullet, inflicting Burning on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Ammunition used by all bows.
Arrows must be equipped in order to be shot.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Adventurer Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Bag with a small carrying capacity, specially made to not interfere with the dodge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mefino’s Trade Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Needlessly ornate bag with an enormous carrying capacity, once used by the spice merchant Mefino.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Prospector Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Large professional backpack used by explorers.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Glowstone Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Bag with a ring of bright glowstone, which negates the need for a lantern.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alchemist Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Advanced bag that slows down the decay of the food it contains.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Brass-Wolf Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Exquisite bag, used by northern Wolf-Knights. It protects the items it carries and its wearer.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Nomad Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Balanced backpack commonly used by travelers.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Primitive Satchel
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Basic craftable bag used to store items, though it lacks a spot to hang a lantern from.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Strongbox Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Tough box that protects both the wearer and what’s carried in it.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Trader Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Cavernous bag with a large carrying capacity, but which slows you down.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Scaled Satchel
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Craftable bag with improved carrying capacity, a lantern slot and which does not restrict your dodge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Preservation Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Elite bag that strongly slows down the decay of the food it contains.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge and removes your dodge invincibility.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Clean Water
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Refreshing drink that carries no risk of disease.
This pristine water was most likely boiled over a campfire or gathered at a fountain.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: River Water
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Drink that carries a risk of Indigestion, a serious disease.
It should be boiled over a campfire to produce Clean Water.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Salt Water
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Drink that actually makes one more thirsty and is likely to cause Indigestion.
It should be boiled over a campfire to produce Clean Water. This will also provide Salt, which can be used in cooking or alchemy.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rancid Water
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Foul liquid that should be avoided at all costs, since it is almost certain to cause Indigestion.
It should be boiled over a campfire to produce Clean Water.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flint and Steel
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Basic survival tool used to light campfires.
It might have other uses, however.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Hangman's Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Old Levant's Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Jade Lich's Idol
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Effigy of a ancient undead mage.
The statue’s underside has grooves that might fit on some device.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bandit Camp Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Enmerkar Tomb Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Vigil Lock Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dead Roots Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Vendavel Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Vendavel Prison Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cierzo Town Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Scarlet Lich's Idol
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Ominous effigy of an undead ruler.
Used as an offering, this could garner the favor of an ancient power, and with it, unique rewards.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Palace Passage Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Krypteia Tomb Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Skill Storage Tablet
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Stone tablet which can be imprinted with a skill, which can then be passed down as a legacy.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Writ of Tribal Favor
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Written proof of the debt the Blue Chamber owes you.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gep's Note
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
“Hey, you were in trouble and I gave you a hand. I can’t stay to watch over you, but I tried to make sure you were comfortable first.
Have a flask of my own personal brew, on me! You owe me one, pal!
~Gep”

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chemist’s Broken Flask
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “Only the Chemist knew how to mix poison, sun dust and demon blood.”
