ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crafting: Scaled Satchel
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft equipment, requiring no crafting station.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crafting: Ammolite Armor
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft equipment, requiring no crafting station.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crafting: Ammolite Helm
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft equipment, requiring no crafting station.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crafting: Ammolite Boots
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft equipment, requiring no crafting station.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crafting: Old Lantern
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft a consumable item, requiring no crafting station.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Firefly powder
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Crushed marsh insects that emit a luminous haze, used in some alchemical recipes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Greasy Fern
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Rare plants that grow on mountains and used in alchemy.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Livweedi
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Phosphorescent leaves with alchemical properties.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ghost's Eye
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Spectral remains used in ethereal-related alchemical recipes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Seaweed
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Algae that, when infused in water in a cooking pot, produces a medicinal tea.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Salt
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Handful of salt, obtained by mining rock or boiling sea water over a campfire.
It is essential in cooking and in alchemy.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Wood
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Branches with a variety of uses, from making campfires to crafting weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tsar Stone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Shimmering gem that glimmers with shining power.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Butcher’s Amethyst
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Beautiful one-of-a-kind gem formed in the heart of a unique horror.
It is a memento from a hard-fought battle to save the city of Monsoon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ammolite
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Fossilized shells of ancient sea creatures.
These iridescent stones are used to craft Ammolite Armor.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Copal
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Ancient resin that can be shaped into armors.
Only the smiths of the city of Berg possess such techniques, though.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tiny Aquamarine
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Semiprecious stone found near water, unlike other gems.
It can fetch a decent price.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Large Emerald
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Hefty precious stone with a lush green color.
It can fetch an enormous price.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Small Sapphire
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Tiny precious stone with a royal blue color.
It can fetch a good price.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Medium Ruby
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Moderately sized precious stone with a burning red color.
It can fetch a high price.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Hackmanite
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Dark gem with intricate magical properties.
Craftsmen in Levant can create wizardly robes from this material.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Power Coil
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Complex array of metals, made by Levant artisants, to power machines such as the Water Purifier in Cierzo.
A few prototype lanterns were built to use a coil as a power source, but they proved too expensive for mass production.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blue Skull Effigy
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Carved idol, infused with Blue Sand.
The venerable ancestors would be satisfied with this opulent gift.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Ingot
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Valuable metal ingot used to easily transport wealth.
It has no practical use but every merchant will buy such ingots at the same fixed price.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Palladium Scrap
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Irregular lump of high quality metal, used to craft exotic arms and armors.
Crafting monster weapons often requires this material, as iron is often insufficient.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Petrified Wood
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Mineral component used by the blacksmiths of Berg to craft an unusual set of armor.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blue Sand
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Glittering powder used by blacksmiths to craft armors made of blue steel alloy.
It is also highly prized as a alchemical ingredient.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mana Stone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Unrefined mineral that radiates raw magic, used in many alchemical recipes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Iron Scrap
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Pieces of iron, obtained by mining or decrafting metal objects.
Decrafting using the “Manual Recipe” of the Survival Crafting menu.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fire Stone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Transmuted Mana Stone, using an Alchemy Kit to merge the stone and oil.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cold Stone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Transmuted Mana Stone, using an Alchemy Kit to merge the stone and a pinch of Blue Sand.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Linen Cloth
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Roll of fabric commonly used in basic crafting recipes, such as bandages.
Basic clothes can be decrafted, using the Survival Crafting menu, into linen.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spikes – Iron
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Spikes that must be placed in a Tripwire Trap, inflicting damage to enemies that step on it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spikes – Palladium
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Spikes that must be placed in a Tripwire Trap, inflicting heavy damage to enemies that step on it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Charge – Incendiary
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Explosives that, when placed in a Pressure Plate, inflict lingering fire damage to enemies that step on it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Charge – Toxic
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Vials that, when placed in a Pressure Plate, inflict lingering decay damage to enemies that step on it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Charge – Nerve Gas
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Gas bladder that, when placed in a Pressure Plate, inflicts Ethereal Damage and Pain to enemies that step on it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spikes – Wood
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Spikes that must be placed in a Tripwire Trap, inflicting low damage to enemies that step on it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Hide
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tanned animal skin, used in many basic crafting recipes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Scaled Leather
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sturdy hide obtained by skinning scaled beasts, used in advanced crafting recipes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crystal Powder
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Refined mana crystal used to craft powerful equipment.
Consuming this powder restores mana, burnt mana and burnt stamina. However, it burns maximum health until one sleeps again.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Predator Bones
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Assortment of fangs, used to craft equipment by binding them to iron weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Coralhorn Antler
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Antler of a Coralhorn male, used to craft strong bows.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Thick Oil
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Flammable fluid used to refuel lanterns and to make incendiary weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Insect Husk
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Dried shell with few uses but that can be sold at a good price.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mantis Granite
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Massive claw of a rock mantis, used to craft weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Occult Remains
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Dry remnants of necrotic beings, used in alchemy and to craft weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Horror Chitin
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Wondrous shell from the mightiest horrors, used to craft extremely powerful weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Green Horror Chitin
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Odd remnants of a unique Shell Horror, proving the beast was slain.
This chitin is too unstable to be of use for crafting weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Beast Golem Scraps
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Finely wrought blades from a beast golem’s jaw, used to craft weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Thorny Cartilage
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Bony spurs harvested from lesser horrors, used to craft weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Manticore Tail
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Spiked tail, filled with venom, used to craft powerful weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Phytosaur Horn
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Poisonous bones of large herbivores, used to craft spears.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shark Cartilage
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Flexible tissue of a crescent shark, used to craft fast Ethereal weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Assassin Tongue
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Venomous tongue of a giant insect, used to craft swords.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alpha Tuanosaur Tail
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Circular tail bone of an apex predator, used to craft powerful axes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Obsidian Shard
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Chunk of fire-infused glass, used to craft bludgeoning weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold-Lich Mechanism
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Box of golden gears, used to craft a wide variety of weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Giant-Heart Garnet
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Large mineralized heart of an Ash Giant.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Conflux Supplies
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Bundle of goods.
Someone else may have a use for these supplies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Silver
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Universal currency of the land.
Note that a hundred coins have a combined weight of 1.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crafting: Chitin Desert Tunic
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft equipment, requiring no crafting station.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Zhorn’s Glowstone Dagger
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
A great hunter’s knife that emits light.
This off-hand weapon requires Dagger Skills to be used.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Light Mender’s Lexicon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Fabled book used to cast runic spells with greater efficiency.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Coil Lantern
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Fueled by an advanced Power Coil, this lantern provides light for an extremely long time.
The coil can be swapped for a new one when the light does run out.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Light Mender’s Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Bag containing the arcane talismans collected long ago by an undead wizard.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Montcalm Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small key that can unlock certain doors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Zhorn’s Hunting Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Trophy-laden bag of the great hunter Zhorn, who used it to trek across vast distances.
<color=#ff5043>Equipping this backpack slows your dodge.</color>

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cooking: Savage Stew
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft food, using a Cooking Pot.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gep’s Generosity
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A golden flower...It hums with welcoming energies. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pearlbird’s Courage
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The skull of a monstrous prehistoric Pearlbird. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Elatt’s Relic
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A candle effigy imbued with Elatt's protective spells. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Scourge’s Tears
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: These sincere tears from an Immaculate scream and sizzle. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Haunted Memory
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The memory of a Ghost's deepest regret, exorcised by forbidden magic. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Calixa’s Relic
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A fragment of Calixa's original shield, shattered in battle against the Devourer. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Leyline Figment
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A drop of the purest mana from a Leyline. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Vendavel's Hospitality
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The torn flag of a notorious rebel, proof justice was served. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Thermal Claymore
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Using magic layered onto quality engineering, this two-handed blade emits both fire and ice energy on command.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Griigmerk kÄramerk
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A cruel spear with a long reach once used by tribal queens one hundred generations ago.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Maelstrom Blade
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A pulsing one-handed sword that seems to stretch reflexively in search of new victims. Inflicts confusion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Kelvin’s Greataxe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The greataxe of an adventurer who always looked out for his friends. This two-handed axe is so cold it drops your temperature.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Challenger Greathammer
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A two-handed greathammer traditionally used to incite a duel to the death against a rival. It grants rage boon and discipline boon on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ghost Reaper
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: This ghostly scythe polearm hungrily rips and tears the souls of the wicked. Inflicts haunted.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pain in the Axe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Every blow from this powerful one-handed axe will draw a scream from the victim. It inflicts pain.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mace of Seasons
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A one handed mace that bends the elements against its victims. Inflicts elemental weakness.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Bow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Simple Bow, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Machete
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Machete, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Hatchet
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Hatchet, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Club
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Club, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Greataxe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Felling Greataxe, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Mining Pick
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Mining Pick, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Quarterstaff
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Quarterstaff, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Guisarme
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Guisarme, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Harpoon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Fishing Harpoon, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gold Pitchfork
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Pitchfork, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Sword
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Fang Sword made from the bones of ancient beasts, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Axe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Fang Axe made from the bones of ancient beasts, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Club
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Fang Club made from the bones of ancient beasts, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Greatsword
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Fang Greatsword made from the bones of ancient beasts, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Greataxe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Fang Greataxe made from the bones of ancient beasts, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Greatclub
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Fang Greatclub made from the bones of ancient beasts, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Halberd
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Fang Halberd made from the bones of ancient beasts, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Trident
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Fang Trident made from the bones of ancient beasts, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ivory Master’s Staff
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Master's Staff made by a master artisan, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sinner Claymore
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Prayer Claymore disgraced by a fallen hero, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sanguine Cleaver
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Cleaver Halberd made by a savage smith, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Extreme Bleeding on enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cerulean Saber
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Steel Saber made by a clever craftsman, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Withering Pole Mace
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Pole Mace taken from a surprisingly competent ancient Troglodyte, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts Confusion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Withering Trident
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Trident taken from a surprisingly competent ancient Troglodyte, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spore Halberd
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Troglodyte Halberd, passed down by your ancestors. The ages have made the fungus all the more virulent... Inflicts Poison.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crystal Staff
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Troglodyte Staff whose Mana Stones have matured, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Butcher Cleaver
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Left alone over the ages, the Amethyst heart of the Butcher of Men has grown into a fearsome weapon, eager to slay again...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Savage Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Fang Shield made from the bones of ancient beasts, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts extreme bleeding on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Golden Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gilded Plank Shield, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spore Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Mushroom Shield left to mature over several generations, passed down by your ancestors. Inflicts extreme poison on shield charge.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Poutine
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A famous traditional comfort food of the northern tribes, invented completely by accident. Hot, filling, and delicious. Increases attack and impact, and protects against the cold.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: – Mason’s Workshop
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A basic Mason’s workshop. Provides 4 Stone for the settlement each day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 2500 Stone: 50 Timber: 20 Housing: 1 Funds upkeep: 40 / Day Construction: 3 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: V2 – Mason‘s Guild
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An improvement to the Mason’s workshop. Provides 6 Stone for the settlement each day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 2500 Stone: 100 Timber: 30 Housing: 2 Funds upkeep: 80 / Day Construction: 3 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: V3 – Mason’s Hall
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An improvement to the Stonecutter’s Guild. Provides 8 Stone for the settlement each day. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Funds: 2500 Stone: 100 Timber: 50 Housing: 4 Funds upkeep: 100 / Day Construction: 3 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: - Woodcutter’s Lodge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A basic Woodcutter’s Lodge. Provides 4 Wood for the settlement each day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 2500 Stone: 20 Timber: 50 Housing: 1 Funds upkeep: 40 / Day Construction: 3 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: V2 - Woodcutter’s Guild
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An improvement to the Woodcutter’s Lodge. Provides 6 Wood for the settlement each day. ---- Construction requirements Woodcutter’s Lodge Funds: 2500 Stone: 30 Timber: 100 Housing: 2 Funds upkeep: 80 / Day Construction: 3 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: V3 - Woodcutter’s Hall
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An improvement to the Carpenter’s Guild. Provides 8 Wood for the settlement each day. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Woodcutter’s Guild Funds: 2500 Stone: 50 Timber: 100 Housing: 4 Funds upkeep: 100 / Day Construction: 3 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: - Hunting Lodge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A basic Hunter’s lodge. Provides 15 Food for the settlement each day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 2500 Stone: 20 Timber: 50 Housing: 1 Funds upkeep: 40 / Day Construction: 3 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: V2 - Hunting Guild
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An improvement to the Hunting lodge. Provides 25 Food for the settlement each day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 2500 Stone: 50 Timber: 100 Housing: 2 Funds upkeep: 100 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: V3 - Hunting Hall
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An improvement to the Hunting Guild. Provides 45 Food for the settlement each day. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Funds: 2500 Stone: 75 Timber: 200 Housing: 4 Funds upkeep: 200 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: - House A
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increase Housing by 1. A certain number of houses are required for many buildings ---- Construction requirements Funds: 2000 Stone: 40 Timber: 40 Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 2 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: - House B
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increase Housing by 1. A certain number of houses are required for many buildings ---- Construction requirements Funds: 2000 Stone: 60 Timber: 20 Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 2 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: - House C
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increase Housing by 1. A certain number of houses are required for many buildings ---- Construction requirements Funds: 2000 Stone: 20 Timber: 60 Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 2 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: City Hall
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides a basic bed. Required for several specialized buildings. Provides 20 Funds per day per point of Housing. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 4000 Stone: 120 Timber: 120 Material: Amethyst Geode Housing: 3 Construction: 6 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: General Store
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sells basic goods, backpacks, lanterns and tents. Provides 100 Funds per day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 3000 Stone: 80 Timber: 80 Material: Chromium Shards Housing: 3 Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blacksmith shop
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sells new equipment and repairs. Generates 100 Funds per day. Counts as 1 House. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 3000 Stone: 120 Timber: 60 Material: Flash Moss Housing: 3 Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alchemist shop
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sells potions, magical items and grenades. Provides 100 Funds per day. Counts as 1 House. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 3000 Stone: 60 Timber: 120 Material: Petrified Organs Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Enchanting Guild
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Uses rare materials to enchant weapons and armor with new effects. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Funds: 5000 Stone: 160 Timber: 100 Material: Voltaic Vines Housing: 4 Funds upkeep: 50 / Day Construction: 6 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Food Store
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sell meals and ingredients Provides 40 Food and 100 Funds Per day Counts as 1 House. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 3000 Stone: 80 Timber: 80 Material: Digested Mana Stone Housing: 3 Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gladiator’s Arena
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Fight different regional champions to earn Medals, which can be exchanged for prizes. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Funds: 5000 Stone: 120 Timber: 60 Material: Bloodroot Housing: 4 Funds upkeep: 50 / Day Construction: 3 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chapel
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Disciple can provide a buff to increase your Barrier by 4 for 48 hours in exchange for 100 silvers. Counts as 1 House. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Funds: 5000 Stone: 200 Timber: 100 Material: Ectoplasm Housing: 4 Funds upkeep: 50 / Day Construction: 6 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Water Purifier
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An advanced Water Purifier, which provides much better water than usual. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Funds: 4000 Stone: 110 Timber: 70 Material: Diamond Dust Food upkeep: 25 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: City Hall – Embassy
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Improves the City Hall’s sleeping bonus by increasing resistance to status effects. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 6000 Stone: 100 Timber: 200 Material: Diamond Dust Housing: 6 Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: City Hall – Krypteia Hideout
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides access to an active skill trainer, who teaches you to spend Health to infuse a weapon with blood. ---- Construction requirements Joined the Blue Chamber Collective Funds: 8000 Stone: 200 Timber: 100 Material: Ectoplasm Housing: 6 Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blacksmith shop – Weapon Forge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Allows crafting of a Custom Weapon Set. Building now generates 150 Funds per day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 6000 Stone: 200 Timber: 100 Material: Diamond Dust Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blacksmith shop – Armor Forge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Allows crafting of a Custom Armor Set. Building now generates 150 Funds per day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 6000 Stone: 200 Timber: 100 Material: Amethyst Geode Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alchemist shop – Fletcher’s Workshop
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Adds new Arrows and Arrow Crafting materials. Shop now generates 150 Funds per day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 6000 Stone: 100 Timber: 200 Material: Chromium Shards Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alchemist shop – Military Lab
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides access to a passive skill trainer, who increases max HP and physical damage. ---- Construction requirements Joined Levant Funds: 8000 Stone: 100 Timber: 200 Material: Bloodroot Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Enchanting Guild – Arcane Library
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Unlocks new enchantments for Trinkets at the Enchanting Guild’s Tablet. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 6000 Stone: 100 Timber: 200 Material: Ectoplasm Funds upkeep: 50 / Day Construction: 5 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Enchanting Guild – Mana Chambers
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The Head Enchanter will freely teach you to infuse your weapon with the Ethereal element. ---- Construction requirements Joined Sorobor Funds: 8000 Stone: 200 Timber: 100 Material: Diamond Dust Funds upkeep: 50 / Day Construction: 5 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Food Store – Inn
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Adds a room that can be rented, to provide a generous sleep bonus and resistance to hot and cold weather. Building now provides 3 housing. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Funds: 6000 Stone: 160 Timber: 200 Material: Amethyst Geode Food upkeep: 15 / Day Construction: 6 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Food Store – Communal Garden
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides a varied selection of free food ingredients that refreshes every week. Building now generates 65 Food per day. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Funds: 4500 Stone: 120 Timber: 300 Material: Digested Mana Stone Food upkeep: 5 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Arena – Training Ground
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Hires a trainer who can teach advanced weapon skills. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 9000 Stone: 100 Timber: 200 Housing: 5 Material: Petrified Organs Funds upkeep: 100 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Arena – Combat Academy
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Hires a trainer who can teach high-commitment specialized Passive skills. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 9000 Stone: 150 Timber: 150 Housing: 5 Material: Voltaic Vines Fund upkeep: 100 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chapel – Temple
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The Healer’s Buff now also increases Status Effect resistance by 25%, and increases the cost to 125 Silver. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 6000 Stone: 250 Timber: 150 Material: Chromium Shards Funds upkeep: 50 / Day Construction: 8 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chapel – Monument to Elatt
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides access to a passive skill trainer, who grants you increased Barrier and Protection stats. ---- Construction requirements Joined the Holy Mission Funds: 8000 Stone: 250 Timber: 150 Material: Voltaic Vines Funds upkeep: 50 / Day Construction: 8 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Water Purifier – Distillery
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides some free Gaberry Wine every week. Building now generates 100 Funds per day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 6000 Stone: 150 Timber: 150 Material: Flash Moss Construction: 6 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Water Purifier – Fountain of Life
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Adds a source of Healing Water that regenerates health instead of Stamina. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 6000 Stone: 100 Timber: 200 Material: Bloodroot Funds upkeep: 50 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: General Store – Courier
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Unlocks a secondary inventory at the General Store, that has goods from a few different shops from other towns. Refreshes to a different shop every 3 days. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 5000 Stone: 100 Timber: 100 Material: Flash Moss Housing: 6 Food upkeep: 10 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: General Store – Caravan
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Allows you to pay 300 Silvers to travel to any other town you choose. Building now generates 150 Funds per day. ---- Construction requirements Funds: 6000 Stone: 100 Timber: 100 Material: Petrified Organs Housing: 6 Food upkeep: 10 / Day Construction: 4 Weeks

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Stockpile – Warehouse
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Stockpile can now store up to 2000 Timber, Stone and Food. ---- Construction requirements City Hall Required Funds: 2000 Stone: 80 Timber: 80 Funds upkeep: 25 / Day Construction: 1 Week

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Golden Crescent
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A delicious fruit enjoyed by Sirrocan nobility.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Baked Crescent
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A cooked Golden Crescent. Rots more slowly.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Golden Jam
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Mashed and preserved Golden Crescent.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Golden Tartine
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Golden Jam, spread across bread, to make more food portions out of it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rainbow Peach
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A rare volcanic fruit. Has properties that resist elements.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Peach Seeds
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Dense seeds useful as an alchemical reagent.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Maize
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A staple food for those living in the Caldera. Quite filling.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Popped Maize
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A delightful salty snack, good for filling an empty stomach.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pypherfish
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A toxic fish. Requires some work to make safely edible.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Pypherfish
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A mana-heavy cooked fish. The toxins have been cooked into the meat...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Raw Torcrab Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A spicy hunk of Torcrab Meat.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Torcrab Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Torcrab’s Egg. Cook before eating.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cooked Torcrab Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Cooked Torcrab Egg, free of diseases.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Torcrab Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Spicy, but safe Torcrab Meat.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Torcrab Sandwich
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A lightly grilled Torcrab Sandwich, a Warrior favourite.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Battered Maize
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Maize coated with delicious salty Torcrab Egg Yolk.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cool Rainbow Jam
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A chilly jam that provides some Barrier, Mana regeneration, and Heat Resist.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Frosted Crescent
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Golden Crescent, rolled in Frosted Powder. Protects against the heat.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Frosted Maize
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A head of Maize, rolled in Frosted Powder. Protects against the heat.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Torcrab Jerky
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Spicy, long-lasting, strengthening Jerky.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cured Pypherfish
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The toxins have been cleansed out of the meat, leaving behind protective qualities.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Maize Mash
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Typical Worker’s food. Provides health regeneration and Discipline.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Frosted Delight
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A rare chilly delectable treat. Provides heat resistance, Barrier, and high Stamina regeneration.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Vagabond’s Gelatin
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A jam containing the properties of several regional jams. Provides unparalleled benefits.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Vagabond’s Tartine
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Vagabond’s Gelatin, spread across bread, to make more food portions out of it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rainbow Tartine
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Rainbow Jam, spread across bread, to make more food portions out of it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Iced Tea
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Recovers Burnt Mana, provides the Cool Boon and begins the process of curing Indigestion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Greasy Tea
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Recovers Burnt Health, and begins the process of curing Ambraine Withdrawal.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chalcedony
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An Alloy of Quartz and other minerals that is strong enough to be forged.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ambraine
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An herb that, when smoked, mitigates the effects of heat and volcanic ash. However, it causes long lasting side effects...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crysocolla Beetle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Volcanic beetle that lives in grease and oil.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Funnel Beetle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Volcanic Beetle that naturally turns heat into cold as sustenance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ableroot
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An essential ingredient to advanced medicines.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sulphuric Mushroom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A combustible mushroom that is key to many alchemical recipes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Hexa Stone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A glowing blue stone in the shape of a flawless hexagon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Calygrey Hairs
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Easily gathers static electricity...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Myrm Tongue
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Coated with easily ignited oil...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dweller’s Brain
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: This organ still pulses with ethereal life!

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gargoyle Urn Shard
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Small drops of mist cling to this magical urn.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Frosted Powder
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A powder that has a chilling effect when used in foods.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Panacea
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A miraculous potion that cures all negative effects.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sulphur Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A bitter potion that offers greater strength, but reduces status resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bracing Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides resistance to status effects for 60 seconds.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shimmer Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Grants Barrier, and 15% buff to elemental attack.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mana Belly Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Grants Mana Regeneration, minor Protection, and reduced Mana Cost for a short duration.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Marathon Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases movement speed.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Barrier Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Grants Barrier.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Calygrey Bone Cage
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Grants healing over time, and improved physical strength.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fire Totemic Lodge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Improves your Fire power, and weakens your Ice resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ice Totemic Lodge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Improves your Ice power, and weakens your Fire resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Lightning Totemic Lodge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Improves your Lightning power, and weakens your Decay resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Corruption Totemic Lodge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Improves your Decay power, and weakens your Lightning resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ethereal Totemic Lodge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Improves your Ethereal power, and weakens your Physical resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Large Chalcedony Stone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Must be charged in the depths of a Volcano’s basin. It’s too heavy to carry inside another backpack!

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Charged Forge Stone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A fully charged Forge Stone, as requested by Josef. It’s too heavy to carry inside another backpack!

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chalcedony Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides 15 resistance to heat when worn.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dusk Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides 5 Barrier.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Brigand’s Backpack
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases your Physical Damage by 15%. Does not impede rolling.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Able Tea
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Recovers Burnt Health and Burnt Stamina, and cures Infections instantly.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Oil Bomb
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Explodes after a moment, dealing Fire Damage and the Scorched Hex.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fragment Bomb
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Explodes after a moment, dealing Damage and Impact. Guaranteed Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Frost Bomb
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Explodes after a moment, dealing Ice Damage and Slow Down.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spark Bomb
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Explodes after a moment, dealing Lightning Damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flaming Bomb
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Explodes after a moment, dealing Fire Damage and the Burning status.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Toxin Bomb
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Explodes after a moment, dealing Decay Damage and the Plague Status.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Nerve Bomb
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Explodes after a moment, dealing Ethereal Damage and the Confusion status.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blazing Bomb
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Explodes after a moment, igniting into a deadly blaze on contact with existing flames.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bomb Kit
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A carefully designed casing for holding more volatile reagents, required for crafting more powerful bombs.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Arrowhead Kit
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Hollow Arrowheads, required to craft special arrows.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flaming Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deals Fire damage, and the Burning Status after a few hits.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Poison Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deals Physical damage, and the Poison Status after a few hits.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Venom Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deals Decay damage, and the Poison Status after a few hits.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Palladium Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deals Lightning damage, and the Doom Hex after a few hits.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Removed – Corrupted Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deals Decay damage, and the Curse Hex after a few hits.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Explosive Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deals high impact and damages an area around the target.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Forged Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deals high Physical damage, but only 10 will fit in a quiver.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Holy Rage Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Cleanse the flames with this purifying arrow.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Soul Rupture Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Causes an exposed enemy’s soul to explode from within.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Removed – Armor-Piercing Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deals Raw Damage that bypasses all resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mana Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deals Ethereal damage, and the Haunt Hex after a few hits.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Miner Armor
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Fully Prevents Burning.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Miner Helmet
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Fully Prevents Confusion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Miner Boots
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Fully Prevents Hamper.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Caldera Mail Armor
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides 50% resistance to Pain and Confusion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Caldera Mail Helm
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides 25% resistance to Pain and Confusion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Caldera Mail Boots
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Provides 25% resistance to Pain and Confusion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Krypteia Armor
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Dark and stealthy armor worn by a secret order of scholars turned assassins. Fully prevents Holy Blaze and Petrify.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Krypteia Mask
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A concealing mask worn by a secret order of scholars turned assassins. Fully prevents Plague.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Krypteia Boots
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Noise-silencing boots worn by a secret order of scholars turned assassins. Fully prevents Blaze.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Manawall Armor
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Ethereal Barrier Armor passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Manawall Helm
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An ethereal Barrier Helm passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Manawall Boots
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Ethereal Barrier Boots passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Militia Armor
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Worker’s clothes, reinforced for battle. Completely resists Burning.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Militia Helm
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Worker’s clothes, reinforced for battle. Completely resists Confusion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Militia Boots
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Worker’s clothes, reinforced for battle. Completely resists Hamper.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A bloody Militia Helm passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Vigilante Boots
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Bloody Militia Boots passed down by your ancestors.

Gun that needs the Fire/Reload skill to shoot.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Diamond Dust
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A fine, shimmering dust of diamond specs.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chromium Shards
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tiny shards of the mineral responsible for the birth of Tsar Stone.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Amethyst Geode
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A rock with an interior lined with precious volcanic gemstones.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Plant Sample
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A sample of an unidentified root...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A sample of an unidentified root...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flash Moss
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A soft moss that ignites and burns to ash in seconds at the slightest spark.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bloodroot
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A thorny, blood drinking root once treasured by an ancient “cult of paper”.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Voltaic Vines
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A root that crackles with tame lightning when flexed.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Molepig Specimen
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An unidentified little runt from a Molepig Warren. It seems cozy in your pack...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Molepig Specimen
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An unidentified little runt from a Molepig Warren. It seems cozy in your pack...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Molepig Specimen
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An unidentified little runt from a Molepig Warren. It seems cozy in your pack...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An unidentified little runt from a Molepig Warren. It seems cozy in your pack...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Molepig Specimen
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An unidentified little runt from a Molepig Warren. It seems cozy in your pack...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Molepig Specimen
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An unidentified little runt from a Molepig Warren. It seems cozy in your pack...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ectoplasm
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The ghostly remains of a deathly sick Molepig runt...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Petrified Organs
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: These petrified Molepig organs easily absorb nearby corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Digested Mana Stone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Mana Stone, melted down into a thick, Mana-rich oil by a Molepig’s stomach.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Short Handle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A glimmering handle. Combined with something else, this would fit a one-handed weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Long Handle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A glimmering handle. Combined with something else, this would fit a two-handed weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Trinket Handle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A glimmering handle. Combined with something else, this would fit an off-hand weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shaft Handle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A glimmering handle. Combined with something else, this would fit a long weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blade Prism
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A strange prism. Combined with something else, this could make a slashing weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blunt Prism
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A strange prism. Combined with something else, this could make a smashing weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flat Prism
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A strange prism. Combined with something else, this could make a cleaving weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spike Prism
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A strange prism. Combined with something else, this could make a stabbing weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gep’s Blade
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A blade left behind by Gep for a worthy adventurer. Unleashes powerful Ethereal Blasts, but reduces your Ethereal resistance. Craft it with Gep’s Generosity to change its shape.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gep’s Longblade
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A long blade left behind by Gep for a worthy adventurer. Unleashes powerful Ethereal Blasts, but reduces your Ethereal resistance. Craft it with Gep’s Generosity to change its shape.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Scepter of the Cruel Priest
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A horrifying mace that brings miserable decay to all it strikes. Reduces your Light resistance

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ghost Parallel
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A strange foreign device, tuned to an ethereal frequency...Inflicts Aetherbomb on foes, but reduces your Physical resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sandrose
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An axe safely holding the power of a volcano. Rapidly inflicts Blaze on a burning target, but reduces your Cold resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grind
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An unorthodox Calygrey Instrument used by a great warrior. Reduces your Impact and Decay resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shriek
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A monstrously diseased spear. Inflicts Plague on hit, which can spread dangerously. Can poison you when you strike with it.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Duty
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The lance of a hero, whose mortality was proved in the Caldera. Inflicts both Burning and Holy Blaze, but reduces your Stamina Recovery.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Revenant Moon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A staff humming with the Scarlet Lady’s immense power...It hungers for your mana and raises the temperature around you... Inflicts Blaze.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Murmure
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: “The Inside Wind is above all, the Inside Wind is within all. To corrupt or destroy it is the greatest evil”. Reduces your Stamina costs -15%.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Distorted Experiment
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
A Chakram attuned to... A variety of other places... Dangerously unstable, not meant for human use!
Chakram spells are necessary to use this off-hand weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tokebakicit
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sti, this thing is cold! Better bundle up before wearing it! Inflicts Chill and Slow, but reduces your Fire Resistance and lowers the temperature around you.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Angler Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Makes the player immune to Petrification, Plague, and Breathless. Provides light that only the wielder can see.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gilded Shiver of Tramontane
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
A luxurious dagger from the far North, whose frigid cold can inflict Hamper, Slow, and Cripple on foes. Reduces your Fire resistance.
Dagger skills are necessary to use this off-hand weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Smelly Sealed Box
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A gross-smelling locked box...Perhaps an unsupervised smithy might have the tools to force this open...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Scarlet Whisper
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Severed threads of the Scarlet Lady’s influence...It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Noble’s Greed
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Gemstone encrusted chains, used for a Noble’s prisoners. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Calygrey’s Wisdom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A puzzle box, fashioned by Calygrey Elders from old dice. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mysterious Long Blade
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A cracked ancient blade that appears wherever it is needed... Could these 3 cracks be healed?

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mysterious Blade
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A cracked ancient blade that appears wherever it is needed... Could these 3 cracks be healed?

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sealed Mace
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An ancient porcelain mace, sealed by some strange language...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: De-powered Bludgeon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An ancient large bludgeon...There are two small reservoirs for different thick liquids...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Warm Axe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A strangely warm axe...Could this heat be intensified somehow?

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fossilized Greataxe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: This Calygrey Axe seems like an instrument...The fossilized bones are cracked...Perhaps it could be repaired with some kind of Calygrey magic?

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rusted Spear
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An ancient rusty spear...Perhaps something dangerously acidic could free it from the rust?

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ruined Halberd
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The silk banner is completely ruined...Could someone restore it to beauty?

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cracked Red Moon
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Inflicts Blaze. The gemstone atop the Scarlet Avatar’s staff has been cracked and should be replaced....

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ceremonial Bow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The white feathers adorning this weapon have been ruined...Perhaps replacements could be added?

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Experimental Chakram
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
This strange weapon fell from a strange hole in the air...Perhaps it is attuned to more?
Chakram spells are necessary to use this off-hand weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Unusual Knuckles
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: These cracked chromium knuckles are ruined by dried blood that can’t be just washed off...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Slumbering Shield
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: This shield reacts to petrified flesh...What would happen if you and someone very large were covered in it...?

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Scarred Dagger
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
This scratched diamond dagger could use a shiny new finish, sealed onto it with flash fire...
This off-hand weapon requires Dagger Skills to be used.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ghost Drum
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deployed with a Skill. Attack it while Deployed to blast nearby enemies with Ethereal Damage, inflicting Aetherbomb on them. The more it hits enemies, the more Charges it gains and the stronger it becomes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sky Chimes
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Deployed with a Skill. Attack it while Deployed to blast nearby enemies with Light Damage, inflicting Holy Blaze on Burning Foes. The more it hits enemies, the more Charges it gains and the stronger it becomes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft armor, requiring no crafting station.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Djinn’s Lamp
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: When held in hand, helps protect the wielder from Status Ailments. Can be refilled with thick oil.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Manticore Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Use this to hatch yourself a new friend!

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ancient Calygrey Mace
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The mace of an ancient Calygrey passed down by their ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Ancient Calygrey Staff
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The Staff of an ancient Calygrey passed down by their ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Conqueror’s Medal
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Can be exchanged in New Sirocco’s Arena for prizes!

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alchemy: Flaming Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft a consumable item, requiring an Alchemy Kit.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alchemy: Poison Arrow
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Teaches how to craft a consumable item, requiring an Alchemy Kit.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alchemy: Soul Rupture Arrow

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Scarlet Gem
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A magical gemstone meant to place atop a staff.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boreo Blubber
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Thick fatty oil. Fortifies and rejuvenates the body and stomach, but can cause Indigestion.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boreo Tusk
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A valuable undamaged tusk.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Waning Tentacle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sticky Medyse tentacles... Abnormal flickering lights are caught in these ones...

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Nephrite Gemstone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Ore altered by insect nectar, needed to make Chalcedony weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sparkling Water
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sparkling water that provides enhanced Stamina Recovery.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Healing Water
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Water that has been fortified with healing roots. Recovers HP over time instead of Stamina.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Black Pearlbird Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Use this to hatch yourself a new friend!

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Lightweight Alchemy Kit
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Lightweight tools used to distill ingredients into potions, to be used on a lit campfire.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Lightweight Cooking Pot
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Lightweight pot that enables the preparation of recipes with more than one ingredient, to be used on a lit campfire.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Virgin Sword
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A pure piece of gear, designed to receive enchantments.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Virgin Greatsword
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A pure piece of gear, designed to receive enchantments.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A pure piece of gear, designed to receive enchantments.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A pure piece of gear, designed to receive enchantments.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Virgin Greataxe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A pure piece of gear, designed to receive enchantments.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cage Pistol
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Designed by a madman, with zero safety mechanisms. Inflicts Weaken and Sapped. Needs the Fire/Reload skill to shoot a bullet.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Virgin Halberd
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A pure piece of gear, designed to receive enchantments.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Virgin Spear

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crawlberry
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Corruption-bearing berries that grow on climbing vines.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Purpkin
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A large sweet vegetable that grows in ground filled with dormant Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boozu’s Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Raw meat that resists corruption. May make you sick if eaten raw.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Antique Eel
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A River Eel, sometimes found in mountainous regions.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Manaheart Bass
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A fish that has evolved to thrive in a Mana-Rich envirnment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Nightmare Mushroom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A poisonous mushroom that can stimulate the mind, when carefully cooked.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Veaber’s Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: An egg from the unusual Veaber species. The yolk has magical properties.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dreamer’s Root
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A root full of safely edible Mana, with latent medicinal potential.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Leyline Water
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Water that glows with magical energy.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boozu’s Milk
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Raw milk from a female Boozu.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boiled Crawlberry
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Boiled Crawlberries that rot slower than usual.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boiled Purpkin
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Boiled Purpkins that rot slower than usual.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cooked Boozu’s Meat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tasty meat that increases resistance to Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Eel
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A crunchy fillet of cooked Eel. Cures Weaken.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Manaheart Bass
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A grilled Mana-filled fish fillet. Cures Sapped.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Grilled Nightmare Mushroom
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Grilling this mushroom has converted the poison into a substance that increases awareness.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boiled Veaber Egg
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Veaber Egg, cooked on a campfire, ridding it of disease. A staple food for Harmattan’s mages.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boiled Dreamer’s Root
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases resistance to cold weather and cures the common cold.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Warm Boozu’s Milk
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Wholesome Boozu milk that is safe to drink, and warms the drinker.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Energizing Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Temporarily reduces skill cooldowns.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Invigorating Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Heals the Sapped and Weaken Debuffs.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Purity Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Substantially decreases Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Quartz Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases resistance to Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sanctifier Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Decreases Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Innocence Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Greatly increases resistance to Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Illuminating Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Grants the drinker the Mana Regeneration of an Illuminator.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Horror’s Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Grants the drinker the Health Regeneration of a Shelled Horror.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Alertness Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Raises your Alertness Level by 1.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spiked Alertness Potion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Raises your Alertness Level by 2.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Wheat
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A versatile grain used in many cooking recipes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sugar
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A sweet powder used in desserts.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dark Stone
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A Mana Stone lightly tainted by Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pure Chitin
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: The shimmering Chitin of an enhanced Scourge Beast. Can be used in many crafting recipes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shield Golem Scraps
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Still conducts electricity... Can be used to craft weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Stingleaf
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A painfully bitter leaf used in making alertness potions.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Iron Wristband
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Used for crafting fist-based weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Palladium Wristband
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Used for crafting fist-based weapons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Tourmaline
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A moderately sized precious stone.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Frankincense
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Aromatic resin used in incense and perfumes. A core enchanting ingredient.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flowering Corruption
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Scourge Chitin that has given birth to flowers. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Enchanted Mask
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A ritual mask honoring an abandoned fertility deity. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Metalized Bones
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Metal Bones covered in ritual markings. It can be used to craft new unique equipment.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Elemental Particle – Fire
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tiny shards of elemental fire.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Elemental Particle – Ice
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tiny shards of elemental ice.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Elemental Particle – Light
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tiny shards of elemental lightning.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Elemental Particle – Decay
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tiny shards of elemental Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Elemental Particle – Ether
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Tiny shards of elemental ether.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Liquid Corruption
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Vile liquid, full of decay.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Purifying Quartz
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A small gemstone that cleanses Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Boozu’s Hide
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Naturally resistant to Corruption. Used in Crafting.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Arcane Dampener
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: For use in Pressure Plate Traps. Weakens foes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flour
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A fluffy powder used in many baked foods.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fresh Cream
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Thick, delicious cream used in cooking. Provides Corruption resistance.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crawlberry Jam
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Long-lasting gooey gelatin, good for stamina, but full of Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Purpkin Pie
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Bursting with energy, but full of Corruption.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pouding Chomeur
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A warming traditional food.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Angel Food Cake
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A delicious dessert that helps your Discipline.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Bagatelle
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A corrupting, but delicious dessert

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cheese Cake
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: This healthy dessert also boosts Corruption resistance

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Cipate
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A crustless meat pie with layers upon layers of meat. Provides excellent healing over time.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gemstone Key A
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Part of a set of 4. Activates the Main Console in the Forgotten Research Laboratory.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gemstone Key B
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Part of a set of 4. Activates the Main Console in the Forgotten Research Laboratory.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Warehouse Key
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Unlocks the Golem Warehouse from the Downtown Ruins in Antique Plateau.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Enchanting Pillar

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shadow Light Kazite Shirt
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: A darkened Kazite Light Shirt, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Golden Iron Knuckles
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Gilded simple Iron Knuckles, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Crafting: Golden Knuckles

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Throw Lantern
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Lantern
Throws your equipped lantern on the enemy, creating a zone of fire for 5 seconds.
Using this skill destroys the lantern.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Predator Leap
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Rage Boon, Melee Weapon
Jumping attack that creates a shockwave upon landing, with high Impact and Damage. Requires the Rage boon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Backstab
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Dagger
Dagger attack. If the attack hits the enemy’s back, the damage and impact are tripled.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Opportunist Stab
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Dagger
Dagger attack. If the enemy has the Pain or Confusion hex, this attack’s damage and knockback are tripled. If it has both, it is 6 times stronger instead.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Dagger Slash
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Dagger
Simple attack with the dagger.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flamethrower
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Torch or Lantern
Shoots fire from the torch or lantern, which also inflicts the Burning status effect.
This skill lowers the durability of the torch or lantern used.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Evasion Shot
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Bow
Shoot an arrow while jumping backwards. Causes the Cripple status effect on the target.
Locking on foes is essential with this skill.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sniper Shot
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Bow
Let loose a very strong arrow shot with a long windup, making it a poor option in the middle of combat.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Piercing Shot
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Bow
Strong shot that goes through enemies and hits other foes behind. Inflicts Extreme Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Push Kick
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Weak attack that excels at knocking back enemies.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sweep Kick
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Weak attack with a wide arc of effect and high Impact. Will knock down a target afflicted by the Confusion status effect.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mana Push
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Spell which inflicts no damage but has high Impact in a wide area in front of the caster.
Can be combined with other spells for powerful effects.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mana Ward
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Envelops you in Mana and, for an instant, you become immune to Damage.
Can be combined with other spells for powerful effects.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Conjure
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Spell which does nothing on its own, but can be combined with other abilities.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shield Charge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Shield
Rush forward to hit foes with your shield for high Impact. Can hit the target twice.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Gong Strike
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Infused Weapon, Shield
Strike your weapon on your shield, removing the elemental infusion to make an explosion of that element.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rune: Dez
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Lexicon
Blue rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes, in the correct order.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rune: Shim
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Lexicon
Red rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes, in the correct order.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rune: Egoth
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Lexicon
Purple rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes, in the correct order.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Rune: Fal
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Lexicon
Green rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes, in the correct order.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chakram Pierce
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Chakram, Discipline Boon
Launch the disc forward, possibly hitting the enemy twice. Discipline is required to cast this spell.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chakram Dance
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Chakram, Discipline Boon
The disc sways left and right as it advances, hitting multiple times and dealing high damage. Discipline is required to cast this spell.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Chakram Arc
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Chakram, Discipline Boon
The disc sweeps the area in front of the caster, dealing high Damage and Impact. Discipline is required to cast this spell.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Counterstrike
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Any Melee Weapon
Completely block a physical attack, striking the attacker and dealing high Damage.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Serpent's Parry
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Dagger
Counter a physical attack with a strong dagger strike. Targets afflicted by Confusion are briefly stunned. Targets afflicted by Pain will be inflicted Extreme Bleeding.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Mace Infusion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: 1-Handed Bludgeon
Block an elemental attack, infusing your weapon with that element.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Flash Onslaught
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Any Melee Weapon, Discipline Boon.
Attack all enemies within a close distance with increased Damage and Impact. Using the skill consumes the Discipline boon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Puncture
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: 1-Handed Sword
Close combat attack which deals high Damage and Impact, and inflicts Pain.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Execution
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: 2-Handed Axe
High Damage and Impact strike that deals twice its Damage against knocked down foes.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Juggernaut
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: 2-Handed Bludgeon
Slow but powerful melee attack that inflicts Confusion. Increases your Impact Resistance during this attack.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Moon Swipe
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Halberd, Staff
Double attack that deals high damage, and that increases in power if you have the Rage or Discipline boons.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shield Infusion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Shield
Block an elemental attack. When you next block, an elemental explosion will burst from you.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Simeon's Gambit
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Spear
Deflect a melee attack and counter with a powerful strike. You will still strike if no attack was deflected, but for less damage,

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Perfect Strike
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Any Melee Weapon, Discipline Boon
Lunging attack that ignores all defenses and inflicts Pain.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Brace
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Blocks an attack, restoring your Stability and giving you the Discipline boon.
All nearby enemies are knocked back.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Pommel Counter
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: 2-Handed Sword
Counter an attack with a high Impact strike using the sword’s pommel. Inflicts Confusion and can chain into melee attacks.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Feral Strikes
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Melee Weapon, Rage Boon
Attack twice, consuming your Rage boon in the process. Inflicts Extreme Bleeding and Pain.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Talus Cleaver
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: 1-Handed Axe
Low blow that reduces the target's mobility. Inflicts Pain and Cripple.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Reveal Soul
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Reveal the blueish soul orb left by deceased thieves and adventurers.
Certain spells must be cast in proximity to a soul.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sigil of Wind
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Activated Wind Altar
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sigil of Fire
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Consumes: Fire Stone
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Sigil of Ice
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Consumes: Cold Stone
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spark
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Tiny fire explosion that deals negligible damage, but can be used in combination with other spells for greater effects.
This spell can light campfires.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Infuse Light
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Blessed Boon
Temporarily adds Lightning Damage to your melee weapon, also making the weapon a useful light source. Consumes your Blessed boon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Infuse Wind
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Activated Wind Altar
Increases the Impact and Attack Speed of your melee weapon, for 3 minutes.
Your stamina burn increases more quickly, however.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Infuse Frost
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Cool Boon
Temporarily adds Frost damage to your melee weapon and inflicts Slow Down on enemies. Consumes your Cool boon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Infuse Fire
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Warm Boon
Temporarily adds Fire damage to your melee weapon and inflicts Burning on enemies. Consumes your Warm boon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Call to Elements
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Grants you a boon that varies according to your location when casting this spell.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Elemental Discharge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Infused Weapon
Shoot a projectile of the element that is infused on your weapon.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fire/Reload
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Pistol, Bullet
Load the equipped pistol with a bullet, or fires if it is already loaded.
Some abilities load special bullets into your pistol, which are fired using this skill.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Frost Bullet
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Pistol, Cool Boon
Load the pistol with a bullet that makes a short-distance blast which slows enemies. Removes your Cool boon.
Shooting it requires the use of the Fire/Reload skill.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Blood Bullet
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Pistol, Possessed Boon
Absorb the enemy’s life into your pistol as a blood bullet, healing yourself.
Shooting it requires the use of the Fire/Reload skill.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shatter Bullet
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Required: Pistol, Iron Scraps
Load a bullet with high Impact which also inflicts Pain.
Shooting it requires the use of the Fire/Reload skill.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Marathoner
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Sprinting consumes 40% less stamina.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Weather Tolerance
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
Increases your Hot and Cold Weather Defense by 8.
Increases your Decay Resistance by 5.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Spellblade's Awakening
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases your maximum Health, Stamina and Mana by 15 each.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Steady Arm
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases Impact Resistance by 10 while your are blocking.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fitness
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases your maximum Health by 25 and the amount of Health you restore while sleeping by 20%

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Master of Motion
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: While under the effect of the Discipline boon, Impact Resistance and all damage resistances are increased by 15.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Steadfast Ascetic
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases your maximum Stamina by 40.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Slow Metabolism
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: It takes more time for you to become hungry, thirsty and sleepy.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fire Affinity
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increase your resistance to Fire by 20 and the Fire damage you inflict is increased by 15%

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Leyline Connection
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
You regain 0.34 mana per second.
This is a constant effect.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Survivor's Resilience
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases your maximum Health by 40.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Well of Mana
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Increases your maximum Mana by 40.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Swift Foot
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Your movement speed is increased by 10%

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Feather Dodge
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: Lowers the Stamina cost of dodging by 50% and allows you to dodge unimpeded even when wearing a backpack.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Fast Maintenance
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc: You repair your equipment 50% faster when you allocate time to Repairing in the rest menu.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Shamanic Resonance
ItemLocalizationHolder.Desc:
The effects of boons on you are increased.
For example, a boon that increases your Fire Resistance by 20 would increase it by 30 instead.

ItemLocalizationHolder.Name: Hunter's Eye
